definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)

sentences.english: There hangs straight on the wall of this grocery a service pledge.
sentences.chinese: 這家副食店在牆上端端正正掛着一張服務公約。

sentences.english: This creates a huge demand for non- staple foods.
sentences.chinese: 這就造成了對副食品的巨大需求。

sentences.english: Egg is one of nourishing foods in our daily life.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋是人們日常生活中一種非常有營養的副食品。

sentences.english: Vegetable is indispensable food for daily life.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜是日常生活不可缺少的副食品。

sentences.english: I had just finished reading the grocery specials in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛讀完報紙上的副食品特惠消息。

sentences.english: Good taste, good nutrition, is China's major non-staple food.
sentences.chinese: 口感好，營養好，是中國的主要副食品。

sentences.english: They usually ate rice as staple food and beans and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 當時通常以米爲主食，副食則是豆類及蔬菜。

sentences.english: Non-staple food of meat and vegetarian sub-categories, but the Indians do not eat beef.
sentences.chinese: 副食分肉食和素食兩類，但是印度人不喫牛肉。

sentences.english: Loudly announcing refreshments and farm products for sale along the streets brings the city a kind of amusing air.
sentences.chinese: 沿街叫賣的小喫和農副食品，給城市平添一份情趣。

sentences.english: Delicatessens and some supermarkets sell them in a dried form.
sentences.chinese: 在副食店和超市以幹品的形式銷售。

sentences.english: A sketch of the structural design of Xianyou Non - staple Food Marked.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了仙遊縣副食品綜合市場工程結構設計概況。

sentences.english: I buy grocery locally and pay with credit card(s).
sentences.chinese: 我在當地的副食店購買雜貨副食並用信用卡付款。

sentences.english: I buy grocery locally and pay with credit card(s).
sentences.chinese: 我在當地的副食店購買雜貨副食並用信用卡付款。

sentences.english: I buy grocery locally and pay with credit card.
sentences.chinese: 我在當地的副食店購買雜貨副食並用信用卡付款。

sentences.english: I buy grocery locally and pay with credit card.
sentences.chinese: 我在當地的副食店購買雜貨副食並用信用卡付款。

sentences.english: A lot of small grocers have gone out of business since the advent of the supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 自從超級市場出現後，許多小副食店已關閉。

definition: non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)
grain crops other than rice and wheat
(lit.) oil, salt, soy sauce and vinegar/(fig.) the trivia of everyday life
